name: Devpooldotmsi's BLASTEROIDS
description:
WELCOME TO BLASTEROIDS!!!

This is a pixelated space shooter where your goal is to get the highest score possible. Go through lots of asteroids and small rocks and try not to explode!

Use WASD to move, mouse to look, and click or SPACE to shoot!

THANK YOU TO @griffpatch and @griffpatch_tutor on scratch for his amazing space shooter tutorials!
